channel.title: Chaoticprod [pi] [torva] [weblclient ready] [hiscores] [vote4points]
channel.description:
Hello and welcome to my first project, its not fully of me, its from vasek too (dunno mopar name)
so yea first of all some information:
its a project-insanity base
what did i add in 30 minutes:
[code]https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,530383.0.html http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,526139.0.html http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,525800.0.html http://www.rune- server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/364738-new-runescape-money-orb.html
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,537697.0.html https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,537024.0.html[/code]
so yea wasnt that hard :p
added before that: [code] duel arena slayer farming vote4points hiscores(base) pk supplies tab(shown below) information @ quest tab(shown below) donor zone killcount thingey beer barrel as cash stock( so u can have more than 2147m, beer barrel is worth in shop 1b, donor only shop is at donor zone pk points system skill zone
chaotics torva pernix virtus
[/code] more but i forgot
so yea here is some media: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O4CjQRLIlKE to give u an idea of the door system (mine has better graphics though) [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/49546433/chaoticprod/beerbarrel.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/49546433/chaoticprod/farm.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/49546433/chaoticprod/kc.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/49546433/chaoticprod/money_pouch.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/49546433/chaoticprod/pkp.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/49546433/chaoticprod/skill%20supplies.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/49546433/chaoticprod/skills.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/49546433/chaoticprod/vote.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/49546433/chaoticprod/hiscore.png[/img] do not rage like: There stands project-nex hiscores ffs@!#, that is how my other server is called
that was the info so here comes the downloads:
[url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/49546433/chaoticprodv1src.rar]Download Chaoticprod v1 Server[/url] [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/49546433/online.rar]Download Chaoticprod v1 Client[/url]
credits: 25% to the ppl of the tuts 25% to ME 25% to Vasek 25% to pi and other servers :p
now a quick tutorial:)
[url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,536345.msg3921405.html#msg3921405]Tutorial here![/url] but for some more info at adding 2 ur site and signing and jarring [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,542443.msg3974789.html#msg3974789]here[/url]
ok, to make it work, u don't need the sql, if u want it make it urself, in the run it will show up with some shit about it but don't give it any attention since it will work :p, ok, to change the ip and port of the server go to src>server>server.java and search for 465, change BOTH to ur port, search for 217.120.221.21 and change it to 127.0.0.1 or ur ip address if u portforwarded
for the client go to client.java and search for 465 change it to ur port, search for 217.120.221.21 and change it to 127.0.0.1 or ur ip if portforwarded
so yea i think i explained some of it, if u really want the sql files and a tut on how to get them working, post pls and ill make 1 :p dun want to now cuz its 1:12 am here :p
(might be some later if the download links work)
btw if u get any errors, post and ill respond!
